caseTitle: United Steelworkers of America v. R. H. Bouligny, Inc.
issue: judicial administration: miscellaneous

caseTitle: Nash v. Florida Industrial Commission
issue: national supremacy: miscellaneous

caseTitle: Dyke v. Taylor Implement Manufacturing Company, Inc.
issue: jury trial (right to, as distinct from extra-legal jury influences)

caseTitle: Hodgson v. Local Union 6799, United Steelworkers of America, AFL-CIO
issue: union-union member dispute (except as pertains to union or closed shop)

caseTitle: Perry v. Sindermann
issue: due process: hearing, government employees

caseTitle: Dunlop v. Bachowski
issue: judicial review of administrative agency's or administrative official's actions and procedures

caseTitle: Franks v. Bowman Transportation Company, Inc.
issue: employment discrimination: on basis of race, age, religion, illegitimacy, national origin, or working conditions.

caseTitle: Mt. Healthy City Bd. of Ed. v. Doyle
issue: First Amendment, miscellaneous (cf. comity: First Amendment)

caseTitle: United Steelworkers of America, AFL-CIO-CLC v. Weber
issue: affirmative action

caseTitle: Pullman-Standard v. Swint
issue: employment discrimination: on basis of race, age, religion, illegitimacy, national origin, or working conditions.

caseTitle: United Steelworkers of America, AFL-CIO-CLC v. Sadlowski
issue: corruption, governmental or governmental regulation of other than as in campaign spending

caseTitle: Silkwood v. Kerr-McGee Corporation
issue: judicial administration: Supreme Court jurisdiction or authority on appeal or writ of error, from federal district courts or courts of appeals (cf. 753)

caseTitle: Richardson-Merrell Inc. v. Koller
issue: judicial administration: review of non-final order

caseTitle: Daubert v. Merrell Dow Pharmaceuticals, Inc.
issue: comity primarily removal cases, civil procedure (cf. comity, criminal and First Amendment); deference to foreign judicial tribunals

caseTitle: Freightliner Corporation v. Myrick
issue: federal pre-emption of state legislation or regulation. cf. state regulation of business. rarely involves union activity. Does not involve constitutional interpretation unless the Court says it does.

caseTitle: BMW of North America, Inc. v. Gore
issue: liability, punitive damages

caseTitle: General Electric Company v. Joiner
issue: Federal Rules of Civil Procedure including Supreme Court Rules, application of the Federal Rules of Evidence, Federal Rules of Appellate Procedure in civil litigation, Circuit Court Rules, and state rules and admiralty rules

caseTitle: Olmstead v. L. C.
issue: handicapped, rights of: under Rehabilitation, Americans with Disabilities Act, and related statutes

caseTitle: Board of Trustees of University of Alabama v. Garrett
issue: national supremacy: miscellaneous

caseTitle: Semtek International, Inc. v. Lockheed Martin Corporation
issue: judicial administration: collateral estoppel or res judicata

caseTitle: Chamber of Commerce of the U.S. v. Brown
issue: federal pre-emption of state legislation or regulation. cf. state regulation of business. rarely involves union activity. Does not involve constitutional interpretation unless the Court says it does.
